title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.284 - Reporting principles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.284 - Reporting principles

State Regulations

The body of doctrine associated with accounting, serving
as an explanation of current practices and as a guide in the selection of
conventions and procedures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.284

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
